DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Rigid Collodion Scarring Liquid (0.125 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Rigid Collodion 'Scarring Liquid' is a clear solution made just for creating a scarred special effect. Paint Rigid Collodion onto skin and it wrinkles as it dries, just peel off to remove. Clear liquid which dries and puckers the skin to create the appearance of a scar. Available in a convenient 0.125 ounce bottle size which includes applicator brush.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.125 ounce Mehron Rigid Collodion bottle will give 5-20 applications, depending on use
Clear solution made just for creating a scarred special effect to create the appearance of a scar
Paint Rigid Collodion onto skin and it wrinkles as it dries, just peel off to remove
